features: 💙【High-quality material and durability】: Crafted from high-quality materials, this commercial mop head exhibits excellent durability and a long lifespan. It withstands frequent use and heavy pressure, maintaining optimal performance over time.

💙【Superior water absorption】: This commercial mop head, designed in a cotton rope state, offers exceptional water absorption. It quickly absorbs a large amount of water, ensuring efficient mopping and saving time and effort.

💙【Lightweight and easy to use】: Weighing only 480 grams, this mop head is lightweight, reducing user fatigue. Its circular end design allows for easy maneuverability, enabling flexible cleaning at different angles.

💙【Ideal for commercial environments】: Specifically designed for commercial environments such as restaurants, offices, and hotels, this mop head excels in high-traffic areas. Its superior water absorption and robust performance make it an ideal choice for demanding commercial use.

💙【Easy to clean and maintain】: This commercial mop head is easy to clean and maintain. It can be effortlessly washed, ensuring long-term hygiene and cleanliness standards, thus meeting the stringent requirements of commercial environments.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mop Replacement Heads (Light Blue 3-Pack) Made from high quality materials, this is a mop head made from 4 strands of loosely twisted yarn, cotton and blended fibers. This provides an ideal balance of better performance, long-lasting durability, and appearance, utilizing the advantages of many different fibers - high durability, absorbency, and ease of cleaning - so that it can be used to its advantage to effectively clean floors.This mop head comes with a universal headband for attaching side loading and clip-on mop handles. The advantage is that it is easy to install and uninstall.75% Recycled Cotton + 25% Rayon Blend Industrial design is absorbent and machine washable with confidence, and this high quality mop head is very durable, which is what you need in a convenient cleaning product!Our looped fine cord mop head is suitable for all environments. Specializing in cleaning tools for residential, commercial, industrial and more - Cotton Mop Replacement Heads.

Product versatility Scope of application Cotton mop head is durable and absorbs water well for a clean and comfortable environment.Safe for all hard surface non-scratch floors such as hardwood, tile, stone, concrete, laminate, vinyl and more. Residential style mop head for cleaning with clean and clean durability. Neatly cut thin rope, strong loop end mop head, scratch free on floors for long term use.Commercial Replacement Loop Mop Heads, Light Blue, Pack of 3. Suitable for both wet and dry use, the cotton mop head is highly absorbent and will not damage floors, resulting in no scratches.Industrial mop head for hard floors, suitable for all materials, hardwood planks, tile, stone, concrete and more.

Home Cleaning Mop Replacing Head Long-time use of mop head Hand washable and machine washable, thus extending the life of the mop head. (Tip: After the mop head is washed, we recommend air-drying it to prevent it from shrinking and affecting the usage. On the contrary, it is not recommended to use the dryer to dry it, which will easily deteriorate its quality)

DETAILS Matching Our mop head is a universal headband, made from cotton-polyester tape. Fits clip-on and side loading handles.The high quality fibers allow the mop head to be washed multiple times, making the mop head more practical. Ring end mop head Ring form ends better minimize abrasion, virtually eliminating lint and untwisting. Ring-end dunnage heads are easy to clean, better at removing debris, strong and long-lasting. Absorbent to help you store water for better mopping. Washable and reusable The mop head is made of high quality cotton and synthetic fiber thin cord, strong and durable.75% cotton + 25% rayon blend provides better absorbency and strength. The high quality fibers allow the mop head to be washed multiple times, making the mop head more practical.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great quality, great price
reviews.reviewText: While I prefer a spray mop or steam mop, another member of my household likes using a good, sturdy, heavy duty mop, so we have all three kinds of mops in our home. The kCarpoly mop heads are excellent mop head replacements for the heavy cotton mop we have. They appear well made and fit the mop handle just as well as the original. The cotton “ropes” are good and thirsty, they can soak up spills quickly. I must concede, my spray mop and steam mops can’t accomplish that task nearly as efficiently.I will only be using these sparingly as they are quite heavy when wet, and that causes me back pain. However I find these mop heads to be excellent quality, and offered at a great price for three replacements. I also love that they came in dark blue. They won’t acquire that dirty looking gray color that others do. Perhaps it’s foolish to care about the color of your mop head, but I appreciate this feature.****About me: Integrity is very important to me. Reviews I've posted will be from items I've had direct contact with. These are my honest opinions. I will not post a review for a product I have not had personal contact with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable Efficiency: kCarpoly Mop Head Review
reviews.reviewText: I recently ordered the kCarpoly 3-Pack Mop Heads and have been pleasantly surprised by their quality and value. These replacement mop heads are designed for heavy-duty use and are suitable for commercial, industrial, and residential areas.What stands out about these mop heads is their cost-effectiveness. They're great for the price and pretty durable for several uses. The deep blue color is also a nice touch, adding style to cleaning.The mop heads are cotton with thin ropes, which I've found effective for thorough cleaning. They attach easily to the mop handle and are just as simple to remove and wash, making them a convenient option for regular use.One of the best aspects is not feeling guilty about disposing of them after several uses. Their affordability and quality make them a practical choice for those who prefer to replace mop heads regularly for hygiene purposes.The kCarpoly Mop Heads are an excellent choice for affordable, effective, and easy-to-use mop heads. They offer great value and functionality, making them an intelligent purchase for keeping spaces clean and tidy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5 bucks a pop
reviews.reviewText: anyone in the restaurant business knows that when u can save a buck on a good product... you take it. these looped mop heads are $5 each and we have been using one for the last month in our family pizzeria. the loops can get stuck on chairs and other machinery in the establishment, but that's all mops. it fits nicely on the stick handle and stayed put as much as any other mop we have used. the absorbency was on point. for $5 a pop take a chance b4 they increase the price. I hope this was helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 3-Pack mop Head. Reusable mop Heads. Well made; durable, clean well and easy to keep them clean.
reviews.reviewText: The kCarpoly brand's "3-Pack Mop Head Supplements" appear to be a high-quality and versatile option for mopping various floor types in residential and commercial settings.The heads are well made, durable, and clean well.They are easy to keep clean by either hand or machine washing. I recommend hand washing to keep floor residues out of your washer. If you wash them in a washer, do so alone or with a towel to help balance the load and avoid transferring dirt from the floor/mop to your other laundry.Don't use any form of fabric softener so that you will maintain absorbency in the mop heads.Pros:Durable: Made from high-quality cotton materials for long-lasting use.Absorbent: Cotton rope design effectively soaks up spills and water.Lightweight and easy to use: Weighs only 480 grams (16.9 ounces) and has a circular end for maneuverability.Versatile: Suitable for wet and dry cleaning on hard surfaces like hardwood, tile, stone, concrete, and vinyl.Reusable and washable: Machine-washable for easy cleaning and repeated use.Universal headband: Fits both clip-on and side loading mop handles.Cons:None that we've noticed.General:A product of China.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The kCarpoly 3-Pack Mop Heads are a good quality replacement mop head. They are probably geared more towards industrial use, but they fit my household mop handle just fine they are pretty beefy so it takes some effort to wring them out by hand, but if you have a wringer you shouldn't have any problem. Easy to pop off the handle and throw in the wash as needed. And for only $5 for each mop at the time of this review, they are a great deal. The blue color is a nice change from the normal drab white-soon-to-be-gray color of other brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars kCarpoly 3-Pack mop Head replacements
reviews.reviewText: A great affordable price for replacement mop heads. These are vacuumed sealed which makes them easy to store until use. I like that while they have thin ropes they feel very premium. I like that I had zero hassles with attaching to the mop stick. 75% Recycled Cotton + 25% Rayon Blend makes these great for washing. After using, you will be glad these are machine washable because they do pick up a lot of dirt! While they are soft loops they are also great for scrubbing as well. I like that they ring out majority of the water and do not leave you with a puddle of water while using. I will note that I use a wringer so that might affect the dry factor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: One of my new year's resolutions was to find more sustainable ways to clean. I bought these wet mop heads to replace disposable pads and chemical solutions they use. They come vacuum sealed but shake out instantly once you unwrap them. The fibers are thick and appeal to my dog (very important). They attached to the mop handle (not included) easy. Note, the dark blue mops are a universal handle fit. I first did the tile floor bathrooms. Honestly, I was a little shocked at how dirty the water was. I concluded that I probably wasn't changing those disposable pads often enough and had simply been re-distributing a lot of the dirt. This only reinforced my decision on using old school wet mops. Next up, basement floor. First time ever. Wish me luck. Thanks!
